title: Products
description: An array of products a suer can subscribe to.

items.title: Product
items.description: Represents a product a user can subscribe to.

id.description: The unique identifier of this product.
id.title: ID

name.description: The human-readable display name of this product.
name.title: Name

stripeProductCode.description: The Stripe product code associated with this product.
stripeProductCode.title: Stripe Product Code

stripeUsagesProductCode.description: The Stripe product code used for metering usage for this product.
stripeUsagesProductCode.title: Stripe Usages Product Code

marketplaceProductCode.description: The AWS Marketplace product code associated with this product.
marketplaceProductCode.title: Marketplace Product Code
